content.text:
# Analysis of Main Target Image

The target image shows two separate structures on a dark checkered surface:

## Left Structure:
- Contains 2 blocks arranged in 2 layers
- Base layer: A red block with two semi-circular indentations (#3 from dictionary)
- Top layer: A blue cube (#7) placed on top of the red block

## Right Structure:
- Contains 5 blocks arranged in 3 layers
- Bottom layer: A horizontal green rectangular block (#12)
- Middle layer: Two yellow vertical rectangular pillars (#15) with a red cube (#9) between them
- Top layer: A horizontal green rectangular block (#12)

# Required Blocks from Dictionary

Based on my analysis, the following blocks are needed:
- Block #3: Red block with two semi-circular indentations (used once)
- Block #7: Blue cube (used once)
- Block #9: Red cube (used once)
- Block #12: Horizontal green rectangular block (used twice)
- Block #15: Yellow vertical rectangular pillar (used twice)

# Assembly Order

```
{
   Step1: Move block with index 12
   Step2: Move block with index 15
   Step3: Move block with index 15
   Step4: Move block with index 9
   Step5: Move block with index 12
   Step6: Move block with index 3
   Step7: Move block with index 7
}
```

The assembly begins with the right structure (steps 1-5), building from bottom to top, then proceeds to the left structure (steps 6-7).
